notex Documentation
===================

Welcome to the **notex** documentation!  
This project converts handwritten notes to LaTeX using OpenAI.

Getting Started
===============

**notex** provides an API for processing handwritten notes and converting them to LaTeX.

ðŸ“Œ **Key Features:**
- Upload PDFs or images
- Convert handwriting to LaTeX
- Fix LaTeX compilation errors
- Download generated PDFs

ðŸ’¡ **Quick Start**
1. Install dependencies:
